name: Johan August Brinell
obverse: Bust of Johan August Brinell facing left
reverse: Brinnel's machine for testing the hardness of a material.
description: Johan August Brinell was a Swedish metallurgical engineer.
Brinell is noted as the creator of a method for quantifying the surface hardness of materials, now known as the
His name is also commemorated in the description of a failure mechanism of material surfaces known as Brinelling.
According to Ulla, 200 examples of this medal were struck in silver.
